title: 1) Rename reset() to stopNavigating()
message:
1) Rename reset() to stopNavigating()
2) Remove broadcast code from setSelectedLocation()
3) Send broadcast indicating marker placement from onTap() instead of setSelectedLocation()
4) Amend draw() so compass is drawn last (fix for UI bug whereby direction path was displayed over the compass rose)

title: 1) Remove compass actionbar button code
message:
1) Remove compass actionbar button code
2) Display compass automatically if navigating
3) Fix Ui bugs whereby actionbar state incorrect following device reorientation
4) Fix search bar bug whereby search content disappeared after device reorientation

title: 1) Refactor to remove references to BearingButtonsLayout
message:
1) Refactor to remove references to BearingButtonsLayout
2) Add internal BroadcastReceiver for dealing with broadcasts from the overlay
3) Amend onCreate() to handle ACTION_SEARCH intents and set up the edittext wdiget in the actionbar appropriately with the search query
4) Refactor actionbar ImageButton handling as per actionbar changes (new buttons)
5) Add onDirectionsClick() method
6) Add onSearchClick() method
7) Refactor onMarkerClick() as per actionbar changes
8) Remove onGoButtonClick() and onCancelButtonClick()
9) Remove displayCancelMarkerDialog() method
10) Remove addBearingButtonsView() and removeBearingButtonsView()
11) Add registerReceiver() method to handle registering the NavigationOverlayReceiver
12) Add geoCodeResult() method
13) Amend error handling in DirectionsTask

title: 1) Add overloaded setSelectedLocation() method, taking in a context (used to…
message:
1) Add overloaded setSelectedLocation() method, taking in a context (used to send broadcast to activity that the location has changed)
2) Add new method isTapWithin()
3) Refactor onTap() to call isTapWithin()
